name: Camlann
description:
Welcome to Camlann, a fast-paced 1v1 game to play in local. 

I strongly advice you into looking at the controls in the options menu. 

In summary, you can only hit your foe when your defense is down (attacking, dashing, jumping...) or when you have a different stance than him.

Get 3 points of difference to win. 

Happy duelling!
